all-of-the-people.title: All of the people
all-of-the-people.lyrics: In that moment the first night...I opened my eyes and looked into the crowd. In that moment, I realized that what I had seen years ago in that dream, I was seeing right now. It was...all of the people.

thick-chains.title: Thick chains
thick-chains.lyrics: Big thangs, thick chains, ain't shit changed

five-passports.title: Five passports
five-passports.lyrics: I got five passports, I'm never going to jail

free-meek.title: Free Meek
free-meek.lyrics:
Screamin' "Free my ni**a Meek Mill"
Ni**as can't wheelie in this free world

december-4.title: December 4
december-4.lyrics:
I arrived on the day Fred Hampton died
Uh, real ni**as just multiply

And they say by 21 I was supposed to die
So I'm out here celebrating my post-demise

father-mother-god.title: Father, Mother, God
father-mother-god.lyrics:
Inhale love and energy
Exhale doubt and negativity

Father, Mother, God we thank you for everyone standing in this circle
We thank you for every obstacle in our lives
We thank you for tonight

We ask that you give us strength and bless all of our bodies, our muscles, and our joints

im-not-black-im-oj.title: I'm not black, I'm O.J.
im-not-black-im-oj.lyrics: O.J. like, "I'm not black I'm O.J."...okay

mama-i-made-it.title: Mama I made it
mama-i-made-it.lyrics:
So with me myself and my microphone, I made it

Mama I made it

i-was-here.title: I was here
i-was-here.lyrics:
I want to say, I lived each day, until I die
And know that I meant something in, somebody's life

The hearts I have touched, will be the proof that I leave
That I made a difference, and this world will see

I was here

focus.title: Focus
focus.lyrics: My thoughts chase each other from room to room in my head if I let them, so sometimes I have to slow myself down

lights-out.title: Lights out
lights-out.lyrics:
Your heart is glowing
And I'm crashing into you

Baby kiss me
Before they turn the lights out
Before they turn the lights out

Baby love me lights out

lost-in-anger.title: Lost in anger
lost-in-anger.lyrics: Why can't you see me? Everyone else can

cathedral.title: Cathedral
cathedral.lyrics: Let's build a cathedral these evils couldn't fuck with

black-effect.title: Black effect
black-effect.lyrics:
I'm good anywhere I go, anywhere I go
I pull up like the Freedom Riders, hop out on Rodeo
Stunt with your curls, your lips, Sarah Baartman hips
Gotta hop into my jeans like I hop into my whip yeah

Mobbin' in a hoodie like Melo
Come up out that pretty motherfucker like "Hello, Hello"

I will never let you shoot the nose off my Pharaoh

no-fear.title: No fear
no-fear.lyrics:
Fuck your subpoenas and your misdemeanors
Was too busy touring out all your arenas

My passport is tatted, it look like it's active
I play on these planes, y'all catch me in traffic

Y'all drag me in court for that shit, y'all backwards
After all these years of drug trafficking, huh?

Time to remind me I'm Black again, huh?

love-of-a-partner.title: Love of a partner
love-of-a-partner.lyrics:
There's love of children
Love of self
Love of God
Love of a partner

All of them have a different shape
But all of them is the same in the end

It's about sensitivity, it's about passion
It's about unconditional giving of self to another person

Congratulations to Quinetta and Britton ❤

shawn-carter.title: Shawn Carter
shawn-carter.lyrics: Fuck all this pretty Shawn Carter shit, ni**a HOV

beautiful-nightmare.title: Beautiful nightmare
beautiful-nightmare.lyrics:
I'm America's worst nightmare
I'm young, black, and holding my nuts like "Geah!"

keep-a-smile.title: Keep a smile
keep-a-smile.lyrics:
They can't keep a good man down
Always keep a smile when they want me to frowns
Keep the vibes and they stood my grounds

They will never take my crown

perks.title: Perks
perks.lyrics: No need to ask, you heard about us

still.title: Still
still.lyrics:
House ni**a, don't fuck with me
I'm a field ni**a, go shine cutlery
Go play the quarters where the butlers be
I'ma play the corners where the hustlers be

many-faced-god.title: Many faced god
many-faced-god.lyrics: I always thought she was an angel, now I'm sure

i-was-here-first.title: I was here first
i-was-here-first.lyrics:
I been crying for too long, what did you do to me?

I used to be so strong, but now you took my soul

I'm crying, can't stop crying
Can't stop crying

society-within.title: Society within
society-within.lyrics:
We gon' start a society, within society
That's major, just like the Negro league

There was a time when America wouldn't let us ball
Those times are now back, just now called Afro-tech

Generational wealth, that's the key

as-one.title: As one
as-one.lyrics:
We're the ones with the flames
We're the fire that remains
We're controlling the game from now on
Yeah! It's the world-renowned, internationally-connected
Locally-accepted, Roc-A-Fella Records

clique.title: Clique
clique.lyrics: Ain't nobody fuckin' with my clique

paris.title: Paris
paris.lyrics:
So I ball so hard mothafuckers wanna fine me
First ni**as gotta find me

What's 50 grand to a mothafucka like me?
Can you please remind me?

most-incredibly.title: Most incredibly
most-incredibly.lyrics: Most incredibly, it's your girl, B

digital-drop.title: Digital drop
digital-drop.lyrics:
Changed the game with that digital drop
Know where you was when that digital popped

I stopped the world
Male or female it make no difference
 I stop the world, world stop...

Carry on

(Shout out to Asli!)

real-friends.title: Real friends
real-friends.lyrics: My friends, real friends, better than your friends

i-can-feel-your-halo.title: I can feel your halo
i-can-feel-your-halo.lyrics:
Hit me like a ray of sun
Burning through my darkest night
You're the only one that I want
Think I'm addicted to your light

suit-of-armor.title: Suit of armor
suit-of-armor.lyrics:
Starting out in Destiny's Child, high-end labels didn't really want to dress four black, country, curvy girls, and we couldn't afford designer dresses and couture.

My mother was rejected from every showroom in New York. But like my grandmother, she used her talent and her creativity to give her children their dreams.

My mother and my uncle, God rest his soul, made all of our first costumes. Individually sewing hundreds of crystals and pearls, putting so much passion and love into every small detail.

When I wore these clothes, I felt like Khaleesi. I had an extra suit of armor. It was so much deeper than any brand name.

whats-free.title: What's free
whats-free.lyrics:
What's free?

In the land of the free where the blacks enslaved
Three-fifths of a man I believe's the phrase

I'm 50% of D'USSE and it's debt-free
100% of Ace of Spades, worth half a B
Roc Nation, half of that, that's my piece
Hunnid percent of TIDAL to bust it up with my Gs

surfboard.title: Surfboard
surfboard.lyrics:
Boy I'm drinkin', I'm singin'
On the mic 'til my voice hoarse

Then I fill the tub up halfway
Then ride it with my surfboard

guru.title: Guru
guru.lyrics: Can you believe this shit Guru?

family.title: Family
family.lyrics:
We family
We we we family

fine-china.title: Fine China
fine-china.lyrics:
Let's go through this thing, come out stronger
The golden journey

Broken is better than new, that's Kintsukuroi
You're fine china, I'm a bull and ball in a china shop

I promise to repair with gold each bowl I drop

together.title: Together
together.lyrics: More than ever we 'gon have to stick together feel me?

that-bitch.title: That bitch
that-bitch.lyrics: You know you that bitch when you cause all this conversation

african-jewels.title: African jewels
african-jewels.lyrics:
The reason why we like this—this jewelry and diamonds and stuff—they don't understand, it's because we really from Africa

(RIP Pimp C)

womanist.title: Womanist
womanist.lyrics:
I feel so happy that I got to grow up in a place where you could be the pastor’s wife, you could be a lawyer, you could be a stripper on the side, you could be a schoolteacher—we saw every kind of woman connect on one common experience, which was that everyone wanted to be great and everyone wanted to do better.

And we really became womanist because of that. And that’s the thing that I carry with me the most, being able to go out into the world and connect with women of all kinds.

hov.title: Hov
hov.lyrics:
Allow me to reintroduce myself
My name is Hov OH H to the O-V
I used to move snowflakes by the O-Z
I guess even back then you can call me
CEO of the R-O-C, Hov!

creole-roots.title: Creole roots
creole-roots.lyrics:
I got bloodlines in Benin, that explains the voodoo
Got poison in my pen, thank God for Lulu

And thank the heavens for BB
Her creole roots run deeply
I'm crazy, you ever leave me I might have to put on a gris-gris

happy-in-love.title: Happy in love
happy-in-love.lyrics:
Damn, look at us now
Pray, pray for the vows
Way up now, it's a long way, a long way down

We came, and we saw, and we conquered it all
We came and we conquered, now we're happy in love
